name: Irwin Raj
introduction: I am a sustainability advisor and purpose-driven leader with over a decade of experience supporting organisations through sustainability transformation. My work spans sustainability strategy and reporting, stakeholder engagement, impact investing, and climate action — all grounded in a deep commitment to driving meaningful change. My career journey cuts across consulting, the built environment, and now the media and marketing sector at Dentsu. I lead Dentsu Good, Dentsu's global sustainability accelerator in the Asia Pacific. I am focused on helping brands embed sustainability into their strategies and communications, transforming them into a powerful engine for innovation and impact.
top_3_advice: Start with clear goals and metrics.
Collaborate with and learn from others.
Adopt a long-term mindset with actionable steps.
how_can_help: I'd be happy to review strategies and support brainstorming processes.
sustainability_journey: My connection to sustainability comes from a blend of curiosity and the drive to make an impact using technical knowledge. I am a chemical & environmental engineer by qualification, and I love the idea of ties between science, technology, and creativity to solve technical issues. Plus, the idea of contributing to a healthier society and planet is both inspiring and urgent.
sustainable_actions: I have worked on both forward-thinking strategies and reporting disclosures in many organisations. My consultancy background has allowed me to explore every aspect of sustainability in business.
challenges_overcome: Shifting mindsets — be it among individuals, companies, or policymakers — can be tough. People often hesitate to adopt new approaches due to uncertainty or perceived costs. I focus on storytelling and data to bridge this gap, showing the tangible benefits of sustainability practices through real-world examples and measurable impacts.
most_proud_of: One of the things I'm most proud of in my sustainability work is helping to bridge the gap between vision and action. It's incredibly fulfilling to see ideas and strategies — whether it's a circular economy initiative, a renewable energy transition, or a community-driven conservation project — move from concepts to tangible results that make a difference.
dentsu_role: Leads Dentsu Good, Dentsu's global sustainability accelerator in Asia Pacific
experience: Over a decade across consulting, built environment, media and marketing
